did.unittitle: ARAMCO photographs of oil facilities in Saudi Arabia

physdesc.extent: in one file, approximately 0.10 linear feet.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Photographic prints (31) depicting oil fields and operations of the Arabian American Oil Company (ARAMCO) in eastern Saudi Arabia, from 1955-1961. The images were produced by photographers working for ARAMCO.

controlaccess.subject: Petroleum industry and trade -- Saudi Arabia
